aspect.name: Coherence
aspect.comment: [Evaluate the logical flow of ideas and transitions between sections.]

aspect.name: Grammar_and_Style
aspect.comment: [Highlight grammatical issues or stylistic refinements needed.]

aspect.name: Adherence_to_Input
aspect.comment: [Assess how well the book aligns with the provided theme and instructions.]

aspect.name: Creativity_and_Originality
aspect.comment: [Evaluate the uniqueness and ingenuity of ideas and storytelling techniques.]

aspect.name: Character_Development
aspect.comment: [Analyze the depth, consistency, and relatability of characters.]

aspect.name: Pacing_and_Tension
aspect.comment: [Comment on the rhythm of the narrative and how it maintains reader engagement.]

aspect.name: Cultural_and_Historical_Sensitivity
aspect.comment: [Assess how appropriately the text handles cultural and historical references.]

aspect.name: Emotional_Impact
aspect.comment: [Evaluate the book's ability to evoke emotions and resonate with the reader.]

aspect.name: Finale_Chapter
aspect.comment: [Ensure the book concludes with a clear finale, even if part of a series.]
